MonitorSet.name: UPSTREAM - PREMIUM - Performance - MS Domain Controller ENG
MonitorSet.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack MSP 2018-05-04.MSP PREMIUM.Performance

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Inbound Bypes Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the total number of bytes replicated in. It is the sum of the number of uncompressed bytes (never compressed) and the number of compressed bytes (after compression).

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Inbound Objects/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of objects received from neighbors through inbound replication. A neighbor is a domain controller from which the local domain controller replicates locally.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Inbound Values Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the total number of object property values received from inbound replication partners. Each inbound object has one or more properties, and each property has zero or more values. Zero values indicates property removal.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Outbound Bytes Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the total number of bytes replicated out. It is the sum of the number of uncompressed bytes (never compressed) and the number of compressed bytes (after compression).

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Outbound Objects/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of objects replicated out.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Outbound Values Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of object property values sent to outbound replication partners.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Pending Replication Synchronizations
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory synchronizations that are queued for this server, but not yet processed.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Client Binds/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of Ntdsapi.dll binds per second serviced by this DC.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Directory Reads/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory reads per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Directory Searches/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory searches per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Directory Writes/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory writes per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::KDC AS Requests
Counter.description: Shows the number of Authentication Server (AS) requests serviced by the Kerberos Key Distribution Center (KDC) per second. AS requests are used by client to obtain a ticket-granting ticket.

Counter.name: NTDS::KDC TGS Requests
Counter.description: Shows the number of Ticket Granting Server (TGS) requests serviced by the KDC per second. TGS requests are used by the client to obtain a ticket to a resource.

Counter.name: NTDS::Kerberos Authentications
Counter.description: Shows the number of times per second that clients use a ticket to this DC to authenticate to this DC.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Bind Time
Counter.description: Shows the time, in milliseconds, taken for the last successful LDAP bind.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Client Sessions
Counter.description: Shows the number of currently connected LDAP client sessions.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS % Searches from LDAP
Counter.description: Shows the percentage of directory searches coming from LDAP.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Searches/sec
Counter.description: Shows the rate at which LDAP clients perform search operations.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Successful Binds/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of LDAP binds per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Writes/sec
Counter.description: Shows the rate at which LDAP clients perform write operations.

MonitorSet.name: UPSTREAM - PREMIUM - Performance - MS Exchange Server ENG
MonitorSet.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack MSP 2018-05-04.MSP PREMIUM.Performance

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::Exchmem: Number of heaps with memory errors
Counter.description: Indicates the total number of exchmem heaps that failed allocations due to insufficient available memory.
Counter.counter: Exchmem: Number of heaps with memory errors

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::Exchmem: Number of memory errors
Counter.description: Indicates the total number of exchmem allocations that could not be satisified by available memory.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::Exchmem: Number of Additional Heaps
Counter.description: Indicates the number of exchmem heaps created by store after startup.

Counter.name: Database::Log Record Stalls/sec
Counter.description: Indicates the Number of log records that cannot be added to the log buffers per second because the log buffers are full.

Counter.name: Database::Log Threads Waiting
Counter.description: Indicates the number of threads waiting to complete an update of the database by writing their data to the log.

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Local Queue Length
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the SMTP queue for local delivery.

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Remote Queue Length
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the SMTP queue for remote delivery.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS Mailbox::Send Queue Size
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the mailbox store''+char(39)+''s send queue

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS Mailbox::Receive Queue Size
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the mailbox store''+char(39)+''s recieve queue

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::RPC Requests
Counter.description: Indicates the number of MAPI RPC requests presently being serviced by the Microsoft Exchange Information Store service.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::RPC Averaged Latency
Counter.description: Indicates the RPC latency in ms averaged for the past 1024 packets.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Largest Block Size
Counter.description: Displays the size (in bytes) of the largest free block of virtual memory.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Total 16MB Free Blocks
Counter.description: Displays the total number of free virtual memory blocks that are greater then or equal to 16 MB.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Total Free Blocks
Counter.description: Displays the total number of free virtual memory blocks regardless of size.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Total Large Free Block...
Counter.description: Displays the sum in bytes of all the free virtual memory blocks that are greater than or equal to 16 MB.
Counter.counter: VM Total Large Free Block Bytes

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Categorizer Queue Length
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the SMTP queue for DS attribute searches

MonitorSet.name: UPSTREAM - PREMIUM - Performance - MS SQL Server (Default Instance) ENG
MonitorSet.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack MSP 2018-05-04.MSP PREMIUM.Performance

Counter.name: SQLServer:General Statistics::User Connections
Counter.description: Displays the number of users connected to the SQL server

Counter.name: SQLServer:Databases::Active Transactions
Counter.description: Displays the number of currently active transactions in the system.

Counter.name: SQLServer:Locks::Average Wait Time (ms)
Counter.description: This is the average wait time in milliseconds to acquire a lock. Lower the value the better it is. If the value goes higher then 500, there may be blocking going on; we need to run blocker script to identify blocking.Average wait time in ms to acquire a lock

Counter.name: SQLServer:Databases::Transactions/sec
Counter.description: Value indicates how active the SQL Server is.

Counter.name: SQLServer:Buffer Manager::Buffer cache hit ratio
Counter.description: Percentage of pages that were found in the buffer pool without having to incur a read from disk.

Counter.name: SQLServer:Memory Manager::Maximum Workspace Memory (KB)
Counter.description: Total amount of memory granted to executing processes. This memory is used primarily for hash, sort and create index operations.
